data.title: Valve Corporation
data.meta_description: Valve Corporation, previously known as Valve Software, or simply Valve (stylized VALVe), is a video game development and digital distribution company. It's mostly known for creating the Half-Life series, along with several other popular titles.
data.text:
Valve Corporation, previously known as Valve Software, or simply Valve (stylized VALVe), is a video game development and digital distribution company. It's mostly known for creating the Half-Life series, along with several other popular titles.

Half-Life

Half-Life: Opposing Force

Half-Life: Blue Shift

Half-Life Deathmatch: Source

Half-Life: Uplink (promotional)

Half-Life: Source
